column2: where the hell is my refund? this is ridiculous
column3: I'm really sorry to hear about the delay with your refund. I understand how frustrating this can be. Refunds typically take 5–7 business days to process. If it's been longer than this, please let me know so I can look into it further for you.

column2: Why does it always take forever to get my refund? This is the third time I’ve had to chase you guys. This is ridiculous.

I understand your concern. Refunds typically take 5–7 business days to process. Please check your bank statement and if it's been longer, feel free to reach out to us.
